definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The drug trafficker is concerned about the condition of the traditional concert.
sentences.chinese: 毒品贩子担心传统音乐会的状况。

sentences.english: On Wednesday, it was a sampler. She says the stripling's fun.
sentences.chinese: 一个星期三场音乐会真是有点拼命干，对不对？

sentences.english: China Philharmonic Orchestra is putting on a series of twelve concerts in winter.
sentences.chinese: 今年冬天中国爱乐乐团将举办十二场系列音乐会。

sentences.english: The concert is on once a year.
sentences.chinese: 这个音乐会一年才一次。

sentences.english: It's a pity that you have missed such a wonderful concert.
sentences.chinese: 真遗憾，你错过了这么精彩的一场音乐会。

sentences.english: This performance was a success and he was greeted by enthusiastic applause.
sentences.chinese: 这场音乐会相当成功，马友友被报以热烈的掌声。

sentences.english: They voted to give a concert to get some money for the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他们建议举办一次音乐会为该医院弄些钱。

sentences.english: This is like the grand final of a concert that will bring your speech to a climax.
sentences.chinese: 它就像音乐会的终曲一样将把你的演讲推向高潮。

sentences.english: Come on, Wang Lin. We'll be late for the concert.
sentences.chinese: 王林，快点吧，我们去音乐会要迟到了。

sentences.english: But coming up with appropriate dress for this concert was proving to be a problem.
sentences.chinese: 但是要为参加这场音乐会找到得体的衣服可是个问题。

sentences.english: Well go to a concert tomorrow evening to hear the symphony orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 明天晚上我们去参加音乐会，听交响乐队的演奏。

sentences.english: Non-participation at the rehearsals and the gala concert results in loss of the prize.
sentences.chinese: 不参加彩排和庆典音乐会的选手将失去奖项。

sentences.english: I have just come back from that concert.
sentences.chinese: 我刚听了那音乐会回来。

sentences.english: Often when one listens to a symphonic concert on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 当一个人从收音机中听交响音乐会时。

sentences.english: Tremolo, Grande etude de concert, Op. 58
sentences.chinese: 震音，音乐会大练习曲，作品58。

sentences.english: They should give the music away and concentrate on promoting concerts themselves.
sentences.chinese: 它们应该让出音乐，把精力集中在由自己推广音乐会。

definition: to perform on a musical instrument
to act (in a play)/to perform/to put on (a performance)/performance/concert/show/CL:場|场[chang3],次[ci4]
(theater etc) to tour/to be on tour/to give itinerant performances/abbr. for 巡迴演出|巡回演出[xun2 hui2 yan3 chu1]
